tool.name: PanCancer SNAPTRON investigate_silent_junctions
tool.command:
cd \$PANCANCER_DIR/scripts/snaptron &&
mkdir -p '${output_folder.extra_files_path}'
&&
Rscript --vanilla investigate_silent_junctions.R
--snaptron_file '$snaptron_file'
--output_folder '${output_folder.extra_files_path}'
&&
tree -H '.' --noreport --charset utf-8 '${output_folder.extra_files_path}' > '${output_folder}'
